author: veithen
msg: Merged r965056 to the 1.5 branch. This is another prerequisite for using the new release process.

author: elecharny
msg: o Factorized some code by creating a new helper method.

author: veithen
msg: Get rid of the "version" property and use project.version instead (note that pom.version is deprecated in Maven 3).

The problem with the magically changing values for pom.version described in the parent POM seems to be related to deploying with uniqueVersion=true. We don't use this anymore and in addition, the problem may already have been fixed in Maven. On the other hand, we need to get rid of the "version" property if we want to automate the release process.
